Ydrasssil/Windlord::

"I wonder what will say Rodimus when he looks you"said Windlord to 
Megatron while he kindly touched Organic's hand


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Megatron Revived:
>  
> Megatron watched as the femme passed.  Something about her did not 
sit well, and he then secretly resolved to watch her every move for 
a while, to see if she possessed any ulterior motives.  He started 
to follow, but then cast a look to the sky.
> "See you soon..."
> He followed the others back to the base.
>
